Beginning: ^The season of jolly, where normal people daydream about cooling down and chilling with their loved ones.
^My chud ass was busy thinking about how I can achieve a 150% on my final exam, which was the bare minimum I needed to pass.
^To numb the pain, I lay in bed, doomscrolling through Reels until my eyes burned...
^"That stands for 'Fuck My Chungus Life', by the way."
^I snicker to myself in my empty room, talking to myself again.
^"GPT, what do I do with my life?"
^Naturally, I end up on my favorite app and dear friend, ChatGPT.
^"It appears you are experiencing distress. If you are in crisis, please contact 98..."
^Alright, I can't rot in this bed forever...
^'Focus on making yourself feel excited, powerful.'
^That's what a wise man once told me.
^Sliding out of my bed and leaving the protection of my blankie, I feel the crisp winter air assault my skin.
^Powering through the arctic, I begin my pilgrimage towards the bathroom.
Testing: ^"Don't talk to this guy babe, he's a chud."
